I guess this is a Peter and Stephen stan blog now.

summary: Together
title: Together
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2xVZJpN

by Bloomcat

Steve finds a little bit of hope as Tony returned to earth alive. Hope that is crushed by Rhodey, when he tells him what Tony had gone through in these past 2 years. He still loved Tony, dreamed of holding him again but after all he had done … he didn’t deserve him.

–

I tried to keep it as much canon compliant as possible. Steve and Tony fell in love and bonded somewhere between Iron Man 2 and Civil War, so Pepper is not romantically involved with Tony. Also a/b/o

Words: 15498, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

blog.name: sadironmanfan
blog.description: Most of the edits don't belong to me! I'm simply rebolgging stuff I like :)

summary: „Tony Stark? My name is Doctor Stephen Strange. I need you to come with me.“
body:
„Tony Stark? My name is Doctor Stephen Strange. I need you to come with me.“

Pepper‘s reaction: Holding on to Tony‘s arm.

Me: Dying because I haven’t realized until now that that is her probably trying to keep him from leaving.

reblog.comment:
„Tony Stark? My name is Doctor Stephen Strange. I need you to come with me.“

Pepper‘s reaction: Holding on to Tony‘s arm.

Me: Dying because I haven’t realized until now that that is her probably trying to keep him from leaving.

trail.content_raw:
„Tony Stark? My name is Doctor Stephen Strange. I need you to come with me.“

Pepper‘s reaction: Holding on to Tony‘s arm.

Me: Dying because I haven’t realized until now that that is her probably trying to keep him from leaving.
trail.content:
„Tony Stark? My name is Doctor Stephen Strange. I need you to come with me.“

Pepper‘s reaction: Holding on to Tony‘s arm.

Me: Dying because I haven’t realized until now that that is her probably trying to keep him from leaving.

summary: We all love Tony Stark
title: We all love Tony Stark
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2P9ehJd

by Whatshername

I don’t know why but I feel the urge to write about the Avengers team, especially Tony and Peter, but all the others too. There will be one shots and maybe shot of two or more parts, I think there will be a lot of tickling as form of bonding.
Some of these fics might be serious but mostly will be comedy. Hope to read your comments :)

Chapter 1: “Tony”.
Tony was scared because Peter had left to go spidermanning without him knowing it. They need to go back to normal after the fight.

i love being bi

the most exciting news

tony stark is canon bi too

blog.name: all-hail-thanos
blog.title: All Hail Thanos
blog.description: ENDGAME SPOILERS!!!! Well, better get use to our new overlord... MCU blog ran by an ENTP Brit with way too much time on their hands... This blog will contain SPOILERS, NSFW context, underage tags (looking at you, non-Starker-shippers! Chill! 😂) All posts/reblogs are tagged. Any actors will be tagged as their characters. Embrace the snap and don't look back! Admin replies under username jessthequeenofstories (Tumblr is awkward with replies, sorry!)

summary: So, did Whiplash go onto the racetrack to kill Tony, because he knew Tony would swoop in as Iron Man if he started attacking the...
body: So, did Whiplash go onto the racetrack to kill Tony, because he knew Tony would swoop in as Iron Man if he started attacking the cars. It was just fortunate that Tony was on the track instead of jumping in to save the day. Is that what was supposed to happen? Wasn’t really clear… Anyway… Iron Man 2 is a decent film.

reblog.comment: So, did Whiplash go onto the racetrack to kill Tony, because he knew Tony would swoop in as Iron Man if he started attacking the cars. It was just fortunate that Tony was on the track instead of jumping in to save the day. Is that what was supposed to happen? Wasn’t really clear… Anyway… Iron Man 2 is a decent film.

It was just fortunate that Tony was on the track instead of jumping in to save the day. Is that what was supposed to happen? Wasn’t really clear… Anyway… Iron Man 2 is a decent film.

It was just fortunate that Tony was on the track instead of jumping in to save the day. Is that what was supposed to happen? Wasn’t really clear… Anyway… Iron Man 2 is a decent film.
